title: Update Times?
body: What time does Riot usually release their updates? Is it right at midnight? Midday? Nighttime? Anyone know?

replies.body:
Patches are generally released after 11:00PM PDT, but it really depends on the specific patch or deployment. You can generally find planned downtimes on the [NA Service Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).

Let me know if you have any questions.
If you mean patchs, where I live (Iowa) It happens around morning/later midnight. Sometimes It can happen in the afternoon tho.
All ranked queues are disabled at 1:30 AM Pacific (Standard / Daylight) Time. Patch deployment starts at 3:00 AM Pacific.
